articles.title: CEO of $68-billion firm quits job to "sit on the beach doing nothing"
articles.description: The statement clarified that Formica had always mentioned that his long-term plan was to relocate to his native land Australia. His resignation comes as a result of his personal desire to settle back in Australia to spend quality time with his elderly parents.
articles.content: Andrew Formica, CEO of London-based $68-billion investment firm Jupiter Fund Management Plc, has decided to step down from his position at the firm on October 1. The move has taken everyone by surpri… [+1429 chars]
